tool_description:
+ It's an API that helps developers add YouTube download buttons (MP3 or MP4) in a simple, secure and free way.
+ Download button is integrated through the Iframe, which means it will not affect the speed of the website and users will never have to leave your website.
name: YouTube to MP3 converter
title: YouTube to MP3 converter

api_list.name: https://api.vevioz.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp3-converter2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp3-converter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp3-converter2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp3-converter2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
